raw_comment: I noticed that applicants with a higher income family and a legacy have a higher chance to be accepted. I wonder how these rates go hand in hand with our societal views, since it seems unfair to accept higher income applicants more than lower income applicants.
ace_sentences: I noticed that an applicant with a higher-income family has a higher chance to be accepted.
I noticed that an applicant with a legacy has a higher chance to be accepted.
I wonder how these rates relate to our societal views.
It seems unfair if a university accepts higher-income applicants more often than lower-income applicants.
